document.full_text: petitions bearing some 55,000 signatures were delivered to the kansas capitol on friday calling for the resignation of a legislator who suggested that illegal immigrants be shot like wild hogs.
document.title: kansas lawmaker suggests immigrants be shot like hogs
lines_and_colors: petitions bearing some 55,000 signatures were delivered to the kansas capitol on friday calling for the resignation of a legislator who suggested that illegal immigrants be shot like wild hogs.
